title: Ticket #678: Add undocumented field to unified param table record
description: If it doesn't already exist: In the record for each config knob in the grand param table, we need a field that flags a knob as undocumented. The idea is if a knob is flagged undocumented, (future?) tools that report the value for all config knobs will skip over undocumented knobs.
creator: tannenba
